column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " Well , I guess we should just go to Ba Sing Se and try our luck there . "
#Text=Korra says : " I do n't know what to do .
#Text=You need to add a little razzle - dazzle .
#Text=We could put on some sort of airbending street performance !
#Text=" Bumi says : " I was gon na say we could cover Tenzin 's robe in sequins , but that 's even better !
#Text=" Korra says : " It sounds ridiculous , but it might work .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm willing to try anything at this point .
#Text=That is the kind of enthusiasm I like to hear !
